segments.text: I see the woman so engrossed in her task, it’s almost admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her concentration is a stark contrast to the bubbling chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water pours over the sink, cascading down, creating a mini flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed, standing right in the middle of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how everything seems peaceful from that window, yet inside, it’s a ticking time bomb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And there’s the boy, on the edge of disaster, reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the excitement on his face, but it’s mixed with an unsettling risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is filled with hope, her hand raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a moment of mischief, yet it feels so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just yell out, ‘Look out!’, but I can only watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
